questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Architecture and buildings
D) Wildlife and animals

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) In front of building
D) Inside a museum

What type of building is shown in the photo?
A) A modern skyscraper
B) A traditional house
C) An office building
D) A shopping mall

What is the architectural style of the building?
A) Gothic
B) Baroque
C) Traditional Alpine
D) Modern

A) A busy street
B) A wooden fence and some plants
C) A body of water
D) A playground

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Tall skyscrapers
B) A tree and clouds
C) A beach
D) A mountain range

A) The people in the scene
B) The building
C) The sky
D) The road

A) A tree
B) A car
C) The building
D) A person

B) Overcast with clouds
C) Stormy with lightning
D) Night sky with stars

A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

B) Gabled roof
C) Dome roof
D) Thatched roof
